title: Bug 102623 - Image not refreshing after importing again
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the new image is not being displayed and the original image remains.
OB: When importing a new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the expected result is for the new image to be displayed.
EB: However, the actual result is that the original image is still displayed instead of the new image.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Import the original image 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
2. Import a new image 'image1.jpg' into the same layout.
3. Observe that the new image is not displayed and the original image remains.
